channel.title: Thieving 667
channel.description:
Hey guys im adding thieving to my 711. So heres my stall code:
[code]else if (id == 4878) //THIEVING STARTS HERE player.sendMessage("You successfully thieve from the stall"); //message can change player.addStopDelay(4); //delay so it don't auto thieve rapidly & people autoclick player.getInventory().addItem(995, 2000); //The amount of GP it gives. player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(881)); player.getSkills().addXp(17, 100); //the exp multiplyer that it gives.[/code]
How can i make it you need level 15 to steal from this stall, after i know to add: [code]player.sendMessage("You un-successfully thieve from the stall"); //message can change[/code]
So the final code will look like:
[code]else if (id == 4878) //THIEVING STARTS HERE REQUIRING LEVEL HERE IF level is less than 15 player.sendMessage("You un-successfully thieve from the stall"); //message can change player.sendMessage("You successfully thieve from the stall"); //message can change player.addStopDelay(4); //delay so it don't auto thieve rapidly & people autoclick player.getInventory().addItem(995, 2000); //The amount of GP it gives. player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(881)); player.getSkills().addXp(17, 100); //the exp multiplyer that it gives.[/code]

item.title: Thieving 667
item.dc:creator: @Zaachhh Zaachhh
item.description:
@Zaachhh wrote:

} else if (id == 4878) {
if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.THIEVING) <= 15) {
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(
“You need an thieving level of 15 to steal from this stall”,
true);
return;
} else if (player.getInventory().getFreeSlots() <= 0) {
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(
“Not enough space in your inventory.”, true);
return;
} else if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.THIEVING) >= 15) {
player.getInventory().addItem(950, 2000);
player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(881));
player.addStopDelay(4);
player.getSkills().addXp(17, 100);
}

Read full topic
